titles.title: My Faith Has Found A Resting Place

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
My faith has found a resting place,
Not in a man made creed,
I trust the Ever-living one,
That he died for me will plead

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
I need no other evidence,
I need no other plea,
It is enough that Jesus died,
And rose again for me

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Enough for me that Jesus saves,
This ends my fear and doubt;
A sinful soul I come to Him,
He will not cast me out.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
My great Physician heals the sick,
The lost He came to save;
For me His precious blood He shed,
For me His life He gave

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
My soul is resting on the Word,
The living Word of God,
Salvation in my saviors name,
Salvation through His blood.
